statements: SELECT * FROM sensor_data;
SELECT sensor_id, location, temperature FROM sensor_data WHERE humidity > 50;
SELECT timestamp, location FROM sensor_data WHERE temperature < 20 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, humidity FROM sensor_data WHERE humidity < 30 AND temperature > 25;
SELECT AVG(temperature), MAX(humidity) FROM sensor_data GROUP BY location;
SELECT sensor_id, temperature FROM sensor_data WHERE humidity > 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE location = 'Kitchen' AND temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 25 ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT location, MAX(temperature) AS max_temp FROM sensor_data GROUP BY location HAVING max_temp > 30
SELECT sensor_id, AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp FROM sensor_data WHERE location = 'Living Room' GROUP BY sensor_id ORDER BY avg_temp DESC
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM sensor_data
SELECT * FROM sensor_devices WHERE device_type = 'Temperature Sensor';
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM sensor_devices WHERE device_id = 10;
SELECT location, temperature, humidity FROM environmental_conditions WHERE sensor_id = 5;
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type FROM sensor_devices WHERE device_name LIKE '%humidity%';
SELECT * FROM environmental_conditions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM environmental_conditions WHERE location = 'Room1' AND temperature > 25 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, location FROM environmental_conditions WHERE humidity < 50;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM sensor_devices WHERE device_type = 'Thermometer';
SELECT * FROM environmental_conditions WHERE temperature > 30 OR humidity > 60 ORDER BY sensor_id ASC, timestamp DESC;

SELECT sensor_id, location, temperature, humidity FROM environmental_conditions JOIN sensor_devices ON environmental_conditions.sensor_id = sensor_devices.device_id WHERE device_type = 'WeatherStation';
SELECT sensor_id, location, temperature, humidity, timestamp FROM historical_sensor_data WHERE temperature > 25.0;
SELECT station_id, station_name, latitude, longitude FROM monitoring_stations WHERE latitude < 40.0;
SELECT device_id, device_name, installation_date, status FROM sensor_devices WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT location, temperature, humidity FROM historical_sensor_data WHERE humidity > 60.0 ORDER BY temperature ASC;
SELECT device_name, installation_date FROM sensor_devices ORDER BY installation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM historical_sensor_data WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, location, temperature FROM historical_sensor_data WHERE humidity < 60;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_devices FROM sensor_devices WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT device_name, installation_date FROM sensor_devices ORDER BY installation_date;
SELECT station_name, latitude, longitude FROM monitoring_stations WHERE latitude BETWEEN 40.0 AND 50.0 AND longitude BETWEEN -80.0 AND -70.0;
SELECT * FROM environmental_conditions ORDER BY sensor_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT sensor_name, temperature, humidity FROM environmental_conditions WHERE humidity > 50;
SELECT * FROM sensor_locations WHERE latitude < 0;
SELECT type_name, unit FROM sensor_types ORDER BY type_name ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, value, timestamp FROM sensor_readings WHERE reading_id <= 100;
SELECT * FROM sensor_readings WHERE value > 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT sensor_name, temperature FROM environmental_conditions WHERE sensor_id = 1
SELECT type_name, unit FROM sensor_types WHERE type_id = 3
SELECT * FROM environmental_conditions WHERE temperature < 20 AND humidity > 70
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM sensor_locations ORDER BY location_name ASC
SELECT * FROM sensors;
SELECT sensor_id, location, sensor_type FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature';
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM locations WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM sensor_types ORDER BY type_name DESC;
SELECT reading, timestamp FROM readings WHERE sensor_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature';
SELECT sensor_id, location FROM sensors WHERE reading > 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, MAX(reading) AS max_reading FROM readings GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING max_reading > 100;
SELECT readings.sensor_id, sensors.location, AVG(reading) AS avg_reading FROM readings JOIN sensors ON readings.sensor_id = sensors.sensor_id GROUP BY readings.sensor_id HAVING AVG(reading) < 50;

SELECT sensors.location, sensor_types.type_name, COUNT(*) AS total_sensors FROM sensors JOIN sensor_types ON sensors.sensor_type = sensor_types.type_name GROUP BY sensors.location HAVING total_sensors > 2 ORDER BY total_sensors DESC;
